about_the_game:
overview:

This is a pool ball game featuring various fruit-themed balls.
There are several fruits to shoot, such as blueberry, strawberry, lychee, starfruit, and more.
When you hit identical fruits, they merge into the next type of fruit.
This merging is depicted as a chemical reaction, resulting in an explosion and explosive sound effects, creating a dynamic atmosphere on the billiard table.

Your objective is to create a watermelon by merging fruits step by step.
The game tracks your playtime, rounds, and points until you successfully make the watermelon.
As you play more, you’ll be able to create a watermelon with faster playtimes, fewer rounds, and fewer points.

The game has three modes with 10, 11, and 12 types of fruits.
The approximate clear times are 5, 10, and 15 minutes for each mode, respectively.

overview:

This is a pool ball game featuring various fruit-themed balls.
There are several fruits to shoot, such as blueberry, strawberry, lychee, starfruit, and more.
When you hit identical fruits, they merge into the next type of fruit.
This merging is depicted as a chemical reaction, resulting in an explosion and explosive sound effects, creating a dynamic atmosphere on the billiard table.

Your objective is to create a watermelon by merging fruits step by step.
The game tracks your playtime, rounds, and points until you successfully make the watermelon.
As you play more, you’ll be able to create a watermelon with faster playtimes, fewer rounds, and fewer points.

The game has three modes with 10, 11, and 12 types of fruits.
The approximate clear times are 5, 10, and 15 minutes for each mode, respectively.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Apple silicon & Intel
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

  • Processor: Apple silicon & Intel
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU

short_description: This is a pool ball game featuring various fruit-themed balls. When you hit identical fruits, they merge into the next type of fruit. Your objective is to create a watermelon by merging fruits step by step. You’ll be able to create a watermelon with faster playtimes, fewer rounds, and fewer points.
